home.title: Create and Share Static Content
home.subtitle: Transform HTML, Markdown, CSV, Excel files, Office docs, images, PDFs, videos, and QR codes into permanent links that render instantly in the browser
home.whatIsDescription: A static, client-only app that turns your content into shareable links. It compresses and encodes data inside the URL (or hash for images, PDFs, and videos), so there is no server storage or database. You can preview, recover, render securely, apply themes, generate QR codes, and share images, PDFs, and videos from a single page.
home.howWorksDescription: Choose a content type, paste or upload your file, and generate a link. HTML is rendered in sandboxed iframes, Markdown is converted and themed, CSV/XLSX becomes interactive tables, and images, PDFs, and videos use hash-based links. You can open in a new tab, use full-screen render-all, or download the original file any time.
home.htmlDesc: Securely render full web pages in sandboxed iframes with clickable links and optional full-screen view
home.markdownDesc: Convert Markdown to styled HTML with theme-aware colors and readable typography
home.csvDesc: Turn CSV/XLSX files into responsive tables with headers and scrollable layouts
home.xlsxDesc: Transform Excel spreadsheets (.xlsx, .xls) into interactive, responsive tables with headers and sorting
home.imageDesc: Upload images (PNG, JPG, SVG, GIF), generate a hash-based link, and render them with instant preview
home.pdfDesc: Upload a PDF, generate a hash-based link, and render multi-page documents
home.videoDesc: Upload videos (MP4, WebM, AVI), generate a hash-based link, and render them with controls
home.audioDesc: Upload audio files (MP3, WAV, OGG), generate a hash-based link, and play them in the browser
home.officeDesc: Render Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files from a public URL using the Office viewer
home.qrDescription: Create QR codes for any text or link, then export or share them in multiple formats
home.qrHowWorksDescription: Paste a text or URL, generate the QR code, adjust size, margin, and error correction, then export PNG/SVG, copy the image, or open in a new tab/popup.
home.qrFeatureGenerate: Generate QR codes from text or links
home.qrFeatureCustomize: Adjust size, margin, and error correction level
home.qrFeatureExport: Export as PNG/SVG, copy image, open in new tab or popup
home.qrFeatureRenderLink: Generate render and render-all links to share the QR code
home.limitsDescription: To keep links short and fast to load, consider the following sizes:
home.limitsNote: Larger files work, but may generate longer URLs and impact loading time.
home.urlLimitNote: Browsers enforce URL length limits (often around 2,000,000 characters). Large images/videos should use external URLs from the Create page for reliable rendering.
home.mediaLimitsDescription: Images and videos are stored in the URL hash. Because browsers cap URL length, large files may fail to open. Use the URL option in Create for reliable playback.
home.mediaImageFormats: Image formats: PNG, JPG, SVG, GIF.
home.mediaPdfFormats: PDF format: PDF files rendered as multi-page documents.
home.mediaVideoFormats: Video formats: MP4, WebM, AVI (browser support varies).
home.mediaVideoLimit: With MaxVideoUrlLength = 2,000,000, the video should be ~1.3 MB or less.
home.mediaPdfLimit: With MaxPdfUrlLength = 2,000,000, PDFs should be ~1.3 MB or less.
home.mediaAudioFormats: Audio formats: MP3, WAV, OGG, AAC (browser support varies).
home.mediaAudioLimit: With MaxAudioUrlLength = 2,000,000, audio should be ~1.3 MB or less.
home.mediaOfficeFormats: Office formats: DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX (requires public URL).
home.mediaOfficeLimit: Office files must be hosted at a public URL; link length must stay below MaxOfficeUrlLength.
home.sharing: Sharing formatted documents, tables, images, videos, and PDFs

create.title: Create New Link
create.sourceUrlLabel: Use a URL instead of uploading
create.urlTooLong: Content is too large to generate a safe link (limit exceeded). Try reducing the size.
create.pasteHash: Paste the code from the link here (everything after #data=). Examples: html-H4s..., md-H4s..., docx-H4s..., pdf-H4s...
create.recoveryHelp: The recovery code starts with the format prefix (e.g., 'pdf-', 'docx-', 'xlsx-', 'md-', 'html-') followed by the compressed content. You can paste the full URL or just the code.
create.qrInputLabel: Text or link for the QR code
create.qrInputPlaceholder: Paste text or a link here
create.qrHint: Your QR code will appear here
create.imageDescription: Upload any image format (PNG, JPG, SVG, GIF) and generate a link that renders it on /render/image.
create.imagePreviewHint: Your image preview will appear here
create.imageCompressionFallback: Compression failed. Using the original image.
create.imageUrlInvalid: Please provide a valid image URL
create.imageInvalid: Please upload a valid image file (PNG, JPG, SVG, GIF)
create.pdfDescription: Upload a PDF and generate a link that renders it with multiple pages.
create.pdfPreviewHint: Your PDF preview will appear here
create.pdfInvalid: Please upload a valid PDF file
create.videoDescription: Upload a video (MP4, WebM, AVI) and generate a link that renders it on /render/video.
create.videoPreviewHint: Your video preview will appear here
create.videoCompressionFallback: Compression failed. Using the original video.
create.videoUrlInvalid: Please provide a valid video URL
create.videoInvalid: Please upload a valid video file (MP4, WebM, AVI)
create.audioDescription: Upload an audio file (MP3, WAV, OGG, AAC) and generate a link that renders it on /render/audio.
create.audioPreviewHint: Your audio preview will appear here
create.audioInvalid: Please upload a valid audio file (MP3, WAV, OGG, AAC)
create.audioCompressionFallback: Compression failed. Using the original audio.
create.audioUrlInvalid: Please provide a valid audio URL
create.officeDescription: Paste a public URL for Word, Excel, or PowerPoint (DOCX, XLSX, PPTX) and generate a viewer link.
create.officePreviewHint: Paste a public Office URL to preview it here.
create.officePastePlaceholder: Paste the embed code or public URL
create.officeUploadError: Unable to read the Office file
create.officeUrlInvalid: Please provide a valid Office file URL

renderOffice.title: View Office File
renderOffice.missingSource: Missing or invalid Office file URL.
renderOffice.hint: Office files must be hosted at a public URL to render in the viewer.

render.title: View Content
render.notFoundDescription: The provided hash does not match any stored content.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

renderError.title: Error Processing File
renderError.description: The file content appears to be corrupted or in an invalid format.
renderError.hint: Usually this happens when the wrong file type was selected during creation.
